_description: Descriptions for UI elements missing from harvested data
_source: Derived from WiX UI dialog documentation

patches.description: Directory browse dialog for selecting installation folder location.
Confirmation dialog shown when user clicks Cancel button.
Feature selection tree dialog for custom installation.
Dialog showing disk space requirements by volume.
Error message dialog for installation failures.
Final dialog shown after successful installation.
Dialog shown when a fatal error occurs during installation.
Alternative feature selection dialog with list view.
Dialog listing applications that have files in use.
Dialog for selecting the installation directory.
Dialog for choosing per-user or per-machine installation.
Dialog displaying license agreement with accept/decline options.
Dialog for choosing repair, change, or remove during maintenance.
Welcome dialog shown when product is already installed.
Dialog for Restart Manager showing applications to close.
Dialog shown when there is insufficient disk space.
Dialog shown when there is insufficient disk space for rollback.
Progress dialog shown while preparing installation.
Progress dialog shown during file installation.
Dialog shown when resuming an interrupted installation.
Dialog for choosing Typical, Custom, or Complete installation.
Dialog shown when user cancels the installation.
Confirmation dialog before beginning installation.
Wait dialog shown while calculating disk space.
Initial welcome dialog for the installation.
Combined welcome and license agreement dialog.
